coded_answer.p: I am writing to complain about the musical show "OVER THE RAINBOW" which I saw in your theatre yesterday.

I had really expectedlooked forward to the show because it was the first time I had seen it in London and I was attracted by your advertisement which looked very exciting. However, I found it very disappointing.

Firstly, the show started at 20:15 not at 19.30 so I had to wait for 45 minutes onin themy seat, so it made me upset. Secondly, I was very disappointed as soon as the actors showed up on stage because they were not the actors who you advertised. Thirdly, you state that there are discounts available but I could not get any reductions at all.

Finally, to make matters worse, your restaurant had already closed after finishing the show so I could not eat anything. You mentioned that "Your perfect evening out!" in your advert. but it was not absolutelyabsolutely not true!
So I must insist that I want to have a full refund. I look forward to receiving your cheque as soon as possible.
